pr_title: Use the platform CL as the Parent on JDK9+

timeline.bodyText: This comment seems out of place, no?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: oops, I was about to start an even hackier approach here then I realised I could just use the platform CL as the parent..
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

timeline.message:
Use the platform CL as the Parent on JDK9+

This solves the issue where JDK services cannot be loaded,
without breaking the MP ClassLoading workaround.

Fixes #8985
